title: Ex-Rich Girl Tells All
description: Wealth is a country, a state of mind, and sometimes a curse. Money can't teach a person how love starts, what makes it tick, and how not to wreck it. Kami, 21, plans to marry her college boyfriend after graduating from Duke University. She travels to England for the wedding but discovers he has moved in with a British girl.Love comes to many as naturally as breathing. Kami isn't in that group. She has to sweat and strive and read the instruction manual.Her former life of wealth and privilege unravels as she learns her family's version of the American Dream amounts to a pack of lies...
author: Kami Corban
